name: Halseny Issue #1
description:
The first issue of our speculative fiction zine showcasing writing by trans authors. We do weird, we do magical, we do horrifically scientifically awesome fantastical fantasy shit that'll make your eyes become rainbows and your rainbows become ice-cream breathing dragons.

This issue includes: VR, failing tarot-readers, magical resurrections, social-media-savvy elemental demigods, word cults, and the world's most incredible train journey.

If that sounds exciting to you, then please download the zine and get ready for the ride of your life.
